title: Combine two champion abilities (passives included)
body:
{{champion:33}} {{champion:3}} Passives. Build full tank = win.

{{champion:76}} Q and {{champion:222}} ult. **GLOBAL SPEARS**

replies.body: Karthus ult{{champion:30}} + Rammus taunt {{champion:33}}
like {{champion:17}}'s global taunt?

{{champion:30}} ult
{{champion:16}} ult

Push r, win teamfight.
{{champion:37}} + {{champion:117}}  You q and turn 2 people into a squirrel, your next auto turns someone into a cupcake

{{champion:26}} /{{champion:245}} + {{champion:143}} 
 I call it THYME
For when you need to season your opponent's tears ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:75}} {{champion:19}} passive **ULTIMATE SUSTAIN**

{{champion:111}} {{champion:157}} ult AOE knock up leading into yasuo ult
Lol, free yas ults
Ashe ult and Ezreal ult, stuns when it hits a champion like ashe but goes through and keeps doing so like ezreal.

Wukong Ult, Katarina Ult.

Instadeath

{{champion:223}} {{champion:4}}   Tahm W + Twisted Fate ult 
Eat them then TP into fountain

{{champion:38}} {{champion:6}} passives

Now {{champion:17}} means nothing >:)

--------

{{champion:34}} {{champion:14}} passives

The most frightening egg I have ever seen O.o

------

{{champion:3}} {{champion:12}} Q

Press Q for skillshot knockups 
{{champion:157}} : Must....not....FAP!!

-------

{{champion:119}} {{champion:115}} ult

Technically an explosive axe grinding & exploding through a path & back? Why? Cause fk {{champion:17}}

> {{champion:3}} {{champion:12}} Q
> 
> Press Q for skillshot knockups 
> {{champion:157}} : Must....not....FAP!!

So... Nami bubble?
I feel like the {{champion:119}} {{champion:115}} ult would end up Heimy's grenade ult, but it keeps bouncing all the way across the map and back.

{{champion:35}}  passive on literally any champion.
{{champion:432}}  passive plus nasus Q stacking.  One shot anyone at late game without building any damage
{{champion:81}} Q  with {{champion:119}}  Q, skill shot high damage spinning axe that can be caught and reduces cd's for all other abilities on-hit.
{{champion:30}}  ult + {{champion:42}} ult = a stock based requiem that insta kills all upon having the Big One.

{{champion:68}} Ult + {{champion:112}} W (Augmented)

Activates in line and pull enemies into middle and stuns + slows for...

_**TONS OF DAMAGE!!!**_

{{champion:25}} {{champion:82}} 
All your damaging spells heal you while creating a shield.

{{champion:113}} ult +{{champion:110}}  ult or Q
An AoE stun that spreads and stuns in an AoE again
Or an up to 1600 range AoE stun that passes through enemies most likely AoE stunning for the whole flight path

{{champion:254}} {{champion:67}} W

ARMOR WILL NEVER SAVE YOU

{{champion:62}} Ult + {{champion:99}} Ult= circular knock up lasers of death with a low cooldown, because who needs a team during a team fight.
{{champion:16}} Ult + {{champion:37}} Ult= heals your team, stuns the enemy team. full cooldown and GG

{{champion:86}} passive + {{champion:16}} W
{{champion:101}} +{{champion:45}} 's passives on {{champion:50}}

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IcPYFNEa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-16T11:26:50.723+0000)
>
> {{champion:86}} passive + {{champion:16}} W
> {{champion:101}} +{{champion:45}} 's passives on {{champion:50}}

but that would be 3 champion things right?
well, the second one yes.

{{champion:17}} Ult +{{champion:68}} Ult 
Basically, shrooms explode and leave a spore cloud that deal damage for each second you spend in them plus apply a poison DoT. Also think of the slow.
{{champion:23}} Ult+{{champion:14}} Passive: I kill you, you die, you kill me YOU DIE
